sentences.sContent: To stop a problem you have to understand its underlying causes.
sentences.sCn: 要解决问题，你得了解其潜在原因。

synos.tran: 潜在的；根本的；在下面的；优先的

phrases.pCn: 标的资产；基础资产；相关/指定资产
[金融]标的证券；附属公司证券

remMethod.val: under(在…下) + lying(躺着的) → 在下面躺着的 → 潜在的

trans.tranOther: The underlying features of an object, event, or situation are not obvious, and it may be difficult to discover or reveal them
